Blog.post: 30 jUnE~2004 YoYo~!! WoW~!! first time do blog sia~!! quite exciting~!! ^^ now is...10.42 30 june 2004~! a day when i created my blog~!! LoLx

31 JuLy~2004~!! wah...todae morning wake up at 7.20 sia~hai...becoz need to go sch and do math mock exam...hehe~!! i do express one de wor~!! becoz i take E math and i am one of the 17 to take it as the first badge~!! so happie~! LoLx 0=) but den...soo damn diffcult sia~ and need to study more than the other NA friens~but it is worth it~! hehe~ todae the math mock exam normal...not diffcult not easy~=P den hor...todae, my class never treat it seriously sia~ still copy here and copy there~! LoLx hehe~ todae got copy...a...jason, hui'e de paper~ den the rest all copy mi~!! LoLx~ they copy mine surly wrong de~ me damn lousy de~ =x den...that stupid daimein go and play with that clock...say wad want to bluff teacher say that the time already over~ but hui'e come to the "RESCUE"~!! LoLx...becoz she wanna do nice nice mah...so she dun wan to hand in early de~ hehe~ she surly do very well in her math with that character~ LoLx~ wah...den after the exam damn happy sia~ can go out leh~!! hehe~ den my frien kelvin return me my bball sia~! damn happy~ somemore new de loh~ LoLx~ den...i go to bball with my frien junior and yong meng to play bball~ wah sei~! junior quite pro wor~!! yong meng improve damn alot sia~ can steal junior bball liao~! Lolx~ den yong meng lose to jr 30 pumping~!! haha~ but like that den is nice to play loh~ hehe~ monday can go sch see yong meng do pumping liao~ haha~ after that we go and eat roti plata~ haha~ yong meng never eat sia~ ai sei~ he going to become skinny liao~ haha~ sec 1 that time he damn fat le~ join NCC for almost 4 yrs liao got improvment wor~!! me and jr eat roti plata~ damn nice and cheap sia~!! vvv gd~ eat until half way yong meng keep on saying he need to go home den later need to go out~ LoLx~!! den me and junior haven't been kb him~ LoLx~ say if he leave now den mon dun let both of us see him~ LoLx~!! he speachless sia~ wahahah~ den after that i go and meet my mei~! jacintha~ we r planning to go to cine to watch means gers wor~ wah...we like damn rich le~ we go orchard to walk walk~ we really like walk sia~ see awhile nia den walk away liao~ less than 10 min sia~ LoLx~ she still xiao mei mei~ dunno wad is window shopping~ but i dun wanna say her~ later she suan me back or use her long finger nails to scratch my hands...-.-" scare* we got see...teddy bear~ cute sia~!!! 0=) and somemore shirts~ but only see alittle bit as for my xiao mei mei wanna walk so fast sia~ =x i wanna buy cookie when we r going to mrt station but suddenly remembered that my mom told me not to anyhow spent money`$$$ hehE~ guai hor~!?? LoLx..JkJk~ den... we go cine at somerset~! my xiao mei mei like no need to eat sia~ whole day i eat long john silver but she only eat a little piece of chicken, one fries...-.-"(lame) and few mouth of drink only sia~ den she full all the way liao~! actually she dun eat and drink those de...but i tell her if she dun eat those, she need to buy a new set sia~ LOLX~ treatened her~!! ^^ we go and buy tickets le~ but den no tickets let for mean girls at 3.10~ so sad~ =( i keep on telling her to watch sisters but she dun wan~ as if watch the sisterS need to use her life sia~ ._." den we go bugis to see her bag~ quite cute sia~ pink~!! and its a slim bag~ cutE cut3~! =D but the price also quite cute le~ LoLx~ den we go and see the SeiYu accories~ those chocolate package damn nice lE~!! i wanna buy~ but remembered my mom words...dun anyhow spend money...-.-" we later go and check out the cinema~ see whether got mean girls mah~ but dunno wad the cinema doing sia~ only got 3 film~ king author...i robot and return...=x we like money alot le~ using ez-link card to switch mrt here and there~ LoLx~when i am going home...she going to her cousin house to see rabbit~ LoLx~ den i go home alone loh~ but den hor...take the mrt and slp~ slp until ADMIRTY SIA~!! soo long~ den faster drop off and switch sides~ haha~ den slp again~ =x i am a pig sia~ slp and slp~ but bo bian... too tired le...hehe~ when reach home i slp another 1 hr...really like pig liao~ =x after that go to bball court~ my dear dear just msg me in time~!! hehe! i call her but she say ask me later to call her again..sad* den i go bball loh~ play quit3 fun as long time never play liao~ play until my knee cape vvv pain... hai~ really i think i need to go hostipal liao~ sad sad...dear dear angry with me le... dunno wad to do loh~ always do the same but this time do alittle bit different~ =\ hai...hope tml she can meet me...hope with all my hope~ =) mish dear dear~!!

1 AuG~2004 WoW wOW~!! its had already been a week since i had my dear~!! hehe~! so happy sia~ although times passes v slow for this week, i really love it~! i had more times with my dear sia~ hehe~ todae i had gone out with her~! happi3* =) we decided to go and watch movi3~!! she wanted to watch [I robot]. h3h3~ i wanted to watch [SiStErS] de but she kept on saying that she will be scared to deA+h~ LoLx~ Ke Ai SiA~!! (^~^) HmMmm...she came to my house at 12+! becoz she also accompany her JiEmEi tOo~! hEr JiEmEi going to her stead house maH~ den my dear also come my hse as it is near bY~! =) she today wear jeans wor~ and a PiNkXx shirt~! look more like xiao mei mei SiA~! haha~! OoPs~! =P...she reached my hse while i was bathing SiA~ lucky i decided to wear shirt then go out of the toilet becoz normally i dun wear de MaH~ heh3~ if nv wear, i bet she would scream until the window glass is brok3n~! hahA~ dun see her so small small size dE~ she had a V hiGh PiTcH voice siA~ sCar3 ScAr3* HmMmm...todae i wore a long sleeve t-shirt, and a jeans(of cUz)~ h3h3~she even ask me that i think sg not hot enuff izzit~ haha~ wE went to SoMeRsEt first~ she wanted to take neoprint today tOo~ i nV take be4 den i was thinking wad post should we take SiA~ =x i guess i am OuTdAtEd bAh...hai~ but got her beside me can "UpDaT3" mE sia~ LoLx~! JkJk~ =D we went to check the tickets for the [I robot] but den only got dunno wad DiGiTaL beside it~ bU zHi DaO sHe Mo Lai dE~ ?_? den i had been keep asking her wan to watch [SiStErS] anot but she still say dUnWaN~ hahA~ can see that she scarE sCare wOR~ =P i wanted to watched as i can perform a PrInCe ChArMiNg sAv3 Th3 PrInCeSs sIA but I sCaRe that it will become PriNc3sS sAvEd thE pRiNcE sIA~ LoLx~!! becoz i dun dare to watch movie dE~ neither do she~ hahA~!! hMmMm...we went to eat long john silver...GuEsS wAd~?!?! she SAID that she IS HUNGRY~!! vvv RaR3 SiA~!! i almost though i was hearing the wrong ThInG~! i guessed i really need to write down this as it is vvv rare in my life for her to say that she is hungry SiA~! hahA~! becoz, normally she eat only 1/4 of the food then full LiAo~ can imagine how skinny she is rit3~? wElL...not really skinny~ it is just nice for her siZe~! that is wad mad3 her EvEn more CutiEr~!! heh3~! but dunno why she kept saying that she is v fAt...-.-" i think she is too humble LiAo~! hahA~! 0=) we ordered 2 sets of combo 1~ chicken meal i think~ it consist of 2 piece of chicken, fries, and a regular drink~ the people bias SiA, give her hot food but give me cold food lEh~!! =x see her cute cut3 den give her better food izzit~!! xP wE "rAcEd" to see eat finish first siA~! LoLx~!! in the EnD of cuz i win~ heh3~!! but she can eat so fast for her size and as a female already v Li hAi LiAo wor~!! haha~ den hor...she ask me whether i had seen a flying chicken wing be4~ i imagine abt it, but den cnt come out with anithing le~ flying chicken still can imagine...but flying chickent winG~?!?!? no wayY~!! haha~ she told me that when she is eating a cooked chicken wing, it is hard to eat as it is too hot mAh~ she had been pulling the drumb and the wing but den suddenly pulled to hard den...WeE~!!! fLyiNg ChiCKeN WiNg~!! LoLx~ i LauGh uNtiL buay ta han~ haha~ we went to J8 too see whether any tickets for the [I robot]~ we decided to take neoprint instead as scare later she will be late after the movi3~ we took CaRd dE...but i really paisei sia~ out second shot was out~ as i never take before u know~ hahA~ that time i really ReD fAcE #P but hai hao bah~ she look nice in the card i look damn Er XiN~ =X i also though that next time hor...take neoprint must take vvvv nice de~!! heh3~!! =D we went to see bear bear~! so cut3 le~!! she even said that she cannot buy winne the pool bear wallet~ as it was her JiEmEi ai ai de~ LoLx~! we went to AmK zOnE X~ wah sei~ saw daimein~!! LoLx~ she ask me whether my dear is my sister~ den i HUG her sia~ daimein also nothing to say~ my dear dear went to play DDR~! i dunno le~ she played until quite pro wor~!! somemore manic MoDe~! haha~ she also played until v cut3 le~!! =D i see until forget to take the pic~ xP becoz i got camera phone mah~ hahA~ she went to play para para~ wow~ EVEN MORE CUTE LEh~! =D den she ask me to play other games as not to make her paisei? HAHA~
